summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 32nd Avenue Northwest from West 57th Street to West 64th Street, and West 57th Street from 32nd Avenue Northwest to West 58th Street, all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon with the necessary cross walks, all in accordance with Resolution No. 994 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
